name: water-spout
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Power increases with the user's remaining HP and is given by `150 * HP / max HP`, to a maximum of 150 when the user has full HP.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Inflicts more damage if the
user’s HP is high.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Inflicts more damage if the
user’s HP is high.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
The higher the
user’s HP, the more
powerful this
attack becomes.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user spouts
water to damage the
foe. The lower the
user’s HP, the less
powerful it becomes.
flavor_text_entries.platinum:
The user spouts
water to damage the
foe. The lower the
user’s HP, the less
powerful it becomes.

water to damage the
foe. The lower the
user’s HP, the less
powerful it becomes.
flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user spouts water to damage the
opposing team. The lower the user’s HP,
the less powerful it becomes.

The user spouts water to damage the

Pokémon. The lower the user’s HP,
the lower the move’s power.
